type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the security scheme. Valid values are "basic", "apiKey" or "oauth2".

description.description: A short description for security scheme.

name.description: The name of the header or query parameter to be used. Valid for apiKey.

in.title: In
in.description: The location of the API key. Valid values are "query" or "header".

flow.title: Flow
flow.description: The flow used by the OAuth2 security scheme. Valid values are "implicit", "password", "application" or "accessCode".

authorization_url.description: The authorization URL to be used for this flow. This SHOULD be in the form of a URL. Valid for oauth2/implicit and oauth2/accessCode.

token_url.description: The token URL to be used for this flow. This SHOULD be in the form of a URL. Valid for oauth2/password, oauth2/application and oauth2/accessCode.

scopes.description: The available scopes for the OAuth2 security scheme. Valid for oauth2.

additionalProperties.title: Value
additionalProperties.description: `Value` represents a dynamically typed value which can be either null, a number, a string, a boolean, a recursive struct value, or a list of values. A producer of value is expected to set one of these variants. Absence of any variant indicates an error. The JSON representation for `Value` is JSON value.

extensions.description: Custom properties that start with "x-" such as "x-foo" used to describe extra functionality that is not covered by the standard OpenAPI Specification. See: https://swagger.io/docs/specification/2-0/swagger-extensions/

SecurityScheme.title: Security Scheme
SecurityScheme.description: `SecurityScheme` is a representation of OpenAPI v2 specification's Security Scheme object. See: https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/3.0.0/versions/2.0.md#securitySchemeObject Allows the definition of a security scheme that can be used by the operations. Supported schemes are basic authentication, an API key (either as a header or as a query parameter) and OAuth2's common flows (implicit, password, application and access code).

scope.description: Maps between a name of a scope to a short description of it (as the value of the property).

grpc.gateway.protoc_gen_openapiv2.option.title: Scopes
grpc.gateway.protoc_gen_openapiv2.option.description: `Scopes` is a representation of OpenAPI v2 specification's Scopes object. See: https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/3.0.0/versions/2.0.md#scopesObject Lists the available scopes for an OAuth2 security scheme.
